இது கார்கால சங்கீதம்!

Back by popular demand : After the grand success of Sunset Cruise on Thames last year, we have had number of requests from several participants to organise a similar event again. To quench the thirst of number of patrons South Indian Society is thrilled to announce a fun filled evening in May 2013, Alaigal Oyvadhillai - Sunset Cruise on Thames. Let’s welcome the summer with our friends. Let’s gather together on a sun-kissed evening for fabulous music, dance and much more. Tongue tickling food guaranteed.

This year we plan to take a different route in Thames and also combine the spectacular view of Olympic stadium. We have also hired a bigger boat with larger dance floor.

And all this at a very nominal cost

Reduced fee for Members Confirming & Paying in advance (by 19th May): £15 (Preferred option)
Non-Members paying in advance: £20
Members and Non-members paying between 20th to 24th May: £25 (No Tickets will be sold at the Venue)
Children between 5 and 10: £10
Children (below 5): FREE.

Spoil yourself, chill out and enjoy. Come and dance like there's nobody watching. Dance, Dance, Dance till the stars come down from the rafters...

Remember to mark your diary for May 25, 2013
